metadata.name: REgeNErate #1
metadata.description:
REgeNErate is a collection that explores the sources of inspiration for an artist and how they can be used to create something new. The collection blends elements of the past and the future, incorporating classic and high-tech elements to create a unique visual pattern. The artworks are influenced by the works of Rene Magritte and Giorgio de Chirico and seek to preserve the spirit of artistic creation even as it merges with the Metaverse. Through the power of visual art, these ideas are able to transcend space and time, eventually finding expression in the form of a block on the Ethereum network.

â€œDuring 1922, the poet Marcel Lecomte showed Magritte a reproduction of Giorgio de Chirico's The Song of Love (painted in 1914). The work brought Magritte to tears; he described this as "one of the most moving moments of my life: my eyes saw thought for the first time. "

Inspired by this event.
